overview.zh: 原子链（ATOS）是一个基于区块链去中心化的金融解决方案，其目标是'让天下有最好用的加密货币'，这个系统可以让每个用户自由的进行国际间金融交易，全球支付、全球结算、全球汇款。
overview.en: ATOSHI(ATOS) is a decentralized financial solution based on blockchain. It aims to be the most useful cryptocurrency. This system allows each user to freely conduct international financial transactions, the global payment, global settlement, and global remittance.
